archimate:DataObject.name: Facility Ratings
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The maximum or minimum voltage, current, frequency, or real or reactive power flow through a facility that does not violate the applicable equipment rating of any equipment comprising the facility. https://www.nerc.com/files/glossary_of_terms.pdf For context: NERC also defines Facility as a set of electrical equipment that operates as a single Bulk Electric System Element (e.g., a line, a generator, a shunt compensator, transformer, etc.)
